description: Urukundo yakundaga imideri yaje kuruhinduramo ubucuruzi bwunguka
title: Umunyamideri w'umwuga wabitangiye akiri muto
content:
Uyu ni Julienne waje gufata urukundo akunda imideri akaruhinduramo umurimo wunguka.  

Nitwa Julienne Mukandayisenga mfite imyaka 19 y’amavuko nkaba niga mu mwaka wa gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye mu Karere ka Nyanza mu Murenge wa Busasamana. Kuva nkiri umwana muto, nakuze nkunda imideri. Nkifite imyaka 16 nibwo natangiye gukora imikufi yo mu ijosi nkoresheje impeke z’ ibishyimbo. Mu by’ukuri nkitangira byari ukwishimisha gusa kuko nabaga nishimye iyo nabaga mbikora, kandi nkashimishwa n’uburyo iyo mikufi yamberaga iyo nabaga nyambaye. Nyuma y’igihe gito abantu batangiye kubimbazaho ibibazo byinshi, ntangira ntyo kujya mbikorera inshuti, abo mu muryango ndetse n’undi wabaga abishaka. Nyuma y’imyaka itatu gusa, ubu natangije ubucuruzi bwanjye buciriritse, aho ninjiza amafaranga y’u Rwanda 2,500 kuri buri mukufi nkoze. 

Ntushobora kwiyumvisha aho ubucuruzi bwanjye bungejeje. Ni impano ikomeye cyane kuba umukobwa yabasha kugira icyo yikorera ubwe. Njye niyishyurira amafaranga y’ishuri, nigurira imyenda, ibyo bituma nta kintu nkisaba ababyeyi banjye. Uretse kuba hari icyo nikorera, natangiye kandi kugira icyo mfasha umuryango wanjye, ibyo bigashimisha ababyeyi banjye kandi bituma nanjye ngira ishema ry’ibyo nagezeho. Ngurira murumuna wanjye utuntu tumwe na tumwe ndetse hari ibikenewe mu rugo njya ngura. Ibyo byose nabigezeho kuko nakomeje gukora kimwe mu byo nkunda.

Inama nagira abandi bakobwa, ni ukwikuramo ubwoba bakizera ko bafite ubushobozi bwo gutegura ejo hazaza habo. Utitaye ku buryo utekereza ko bikomeye kubigeraho, nushyiramo agatege, uzabona ko uzagera ku byiza nta kabuza. Ni wowe uri kwikorera, kandi uri kwiremera ibyiza. Ibyo nubigeraho uzaba uri gutegurira amahirwe abandi bakobwa bo mu Rwanda. Bakobwa, muze dushyire hamwe kandi dukore cyane kugirango tugere ku iterambere ryacu.
